name: ClearSlate - Job Bias Detector
desc: Designed and developed a tool to assess job description biases across gender, age, disability, and race. Trained a predictive model using Hugging Face Transformers and NLP techniques to extract embeddings. Built the UI with React.js and the backend with Python and Django.

name: Recipe Generator
desc: Developed a Recipe Generator website with image classification using transfer learning to identify recipes from food images. Built a dynamic recipe recommendation system based on user ingredients. Designed a user-friendly interface for seamless interaction.

name: Expense Tracker
desc: Built a cross-platform Expense Tracker app using Flutter for iOS and Android. Integrated a user-friendly UI for tracking expenses. Used Firebase for real-time data storage and authentication. Added charts to visualize spending patterns, and enabled push notifications for budget alerts.

name: JSON Schema Validator
desc: Developed a JSON Schema Validator in Python to streamline backend logic, detecting mismatches between input JSON and schema definitions with clear error messages for quick debugging. Built a user-friendly interface using React.js and deployed the app on Netlify.

name: E-Commerce Platform
desc: Developed a scalable, user-friendly e-commerce platform using Laravel, offering a seamless shopping experience. Built a responsive UI with features like product filtering, sorting, and personalized recommendations. Implemented secure customer account management with Laravelâ€™s authentication system.
